sql.if: AND ( district LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )

mapper.select: select a.no, a.district, a.title, a.description, a.address, a.phone, b.travel_no as travelNo, b.filename from travel a inner join travel_image b on a.no = b.travel_no WHERE a.no > 0
